 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָלַל‎</span>] **verb** **Po\`el**, ==act severely== (toward) (Late Hebrew ***id., deal with*** (rare), and derivatives; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***do a thing*** (drink, beat, give) ***a second time***, II. ***divert, occupy***, see ***divert, occupy oneself with*** (food, a woman, etc.); Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***cause, occasion, affair)***; — ***act severely***, always with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person: ***Perfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוֺלַלְתָּ לִי‎</span> [[Lam.1.22|Lam 1:22]] ***as thou hast acted severely to me*** (in punishment, subject<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְמִי ע‎</span> [[Lam.2.20|Lam 2:20]] ***to whom hast thou acted*** thus ***severely ?*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵינִי עוֺלְלָה לְנַפְשִׁי‎</span> [[Lam.3.51|Lam 3:51]] ***my eye deals severely with me***, i.e. gives me pain (?; text dubious; compare [[BDB#Perles|Perles]]<sup>Anal.18</sup> [[BDB#Bu|Bu]]). ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוֺלֵל לָמוֺ‎</span> [[Lam.1.22|Lam 1:22]] ***deal severely with them.*** — See also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> **denominative** below **Po\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַכְאֹבִי אֲשֶׁר עוֺלַל לִי‎</span> [[Lam.1.12|Lam 1:12]] ***my pain which is severely dealt out to me.*** **Hithpa.** ***Perfect*** 

**1.** ***busy, divert oneself*** with (compare Arabic see ), always with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> person: 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶתאֲֿשֶׁר חִתְעַלַּלְתִּי בְּ‎</span> [[Exod.10.2|Exod 10:2]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) ***how I*** [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>] ***have made a toy of*** Egypt; especially ***deal wantonly, ruthlessly*** with (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> person): 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִתְעַלֵּל‎</span> [[1Sam.6.6|1Sam 6:6]] 2 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִתְעַלַּלְתְּ‎</span> [[Num.22.29|Num 22:29]] ([[BDB#J|J]] [[BDB#E|E]]; Balsaam's ass); 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִתְעַלְּלוּ‎</span> consecutive [[1Sam.31.4|1Sam 31:4]] = [[1Chr.10.4|1Chr 10:4]]; [[Jer.38.19|Jer 38:19]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּתְעַלְּלוּקּבָהּ‎</span> [[Judg.19.25|Judg 19:25]] (of abusing a woman; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיֵּדְעוּ אֹתָהּ‎</span>). **Hithpo\`el** ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֵהִתְעוֺלֵל עֲלִלוֺר‎</span> [[Ps.141.4|Ps 141:4]] ***to practise practices*** in wickedness (perhaps denominative). 



 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָלַל‎</span>] **verb denominative Po\`.** ==glean== (grapes or olives; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִפֵּט‎</span> of grain); — ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּעוֺלֵל‎</span> [[Lev.19.10|Lev 19:10]] (object <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֶּרֶם‎</span>; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּלַפֵּט‎</span>), [[Deut.24.21|Deut 24:21]] (absolute, + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַחֲרֶיךָ‎</span>); 3 masculine plural figurative (+ ***Infinitive absolute***) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוֺלֵל יְעוֺלְלוּ כַגֶּפֶן שְׁאֵרִית‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשְׂרָאֵל‎</span> [[Jer.6.9|Jer 6:9]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְעֹלְלֻהוּ‎</span> [[Judg.20.45|Judg 20:45]] ***they made a gleaning of them*** (i. e. smote the fugitives). 

 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָלַל‎</span>] **verb denominative** ==act or play the child==; — only **Po\`.** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַמִּי נֹגְשָׂיו מְעוֺלֵל‎</span> [[Isa.3.12|Isa 3:12]] ***my people — its ruler is acting the child***. 

 III. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָלַל‎</span>] **verb** ==insert, thrust in== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, whence <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***yoke***; compare Old Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עלל‎</span>, [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲלַל‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, all ***enter***); — only **Po\`.** ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְעֹלַלְתִּי בֶעָפָר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַרְנִי‎</span> [[Job.16.15|Job 16:15]] figurative of humiliation.
